item.title: Telangana HC questions partiality to Mayor Gadwal in land regularisation
item.description:
<![CDATA[Hyderabad: The Telangana High Court on Wednesday, December 10, questioned whether GOs issued by the previous Bharat Rashtra Samithi (BRS) government allowing regularisation of encroachments on government land in Banjara Hills favoured GHMC Mayor Gadwal Vijayalaxmi and her brother K Venkateshwara Rao.
The two are children of K Keshava Rao, who left BRS and joined the Congress in July 2024.
A division bench of Chief Justice Aparesh Kumar Singh and Justice Ghouse Meera Mohiuddin was hearing a pub...]]>
